system

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • system.Order
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Order>

    public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Order>
    All information of an order are stored here.
    Author:
    maxspahn, jeremyaugot
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                                ItemNotInOrderException

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • getBill

        public double getBill()

        The price.

      • finishOrder

        public void finishOrder()
                 throws OrderNotCompletException
        Finishing the order. If the order is not completed, no courier allocated, it throws an exception. The completion date is set as the current date. The courier is set available. And the price of the order is added to the sum of selling of the restaurant.
        Throws:
        OrderNotCompletException

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overriding of the function to print the order. A second line is added if it is completed.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
